channel.title: Csta on C'est la Z
channel.description: Recent content in Csta on C'est la Z

item.title: CSTA 2018 - Funding and Direction
item.description: In addition to everything I wrote about last time there were a couple of other big announcements at this year's CSTA conference. Both announcements deal with funding. First, there is a new class of CSTA membership. The free tier remains but now for $50 you can join CSTA+. This new level of membership comes with a bunch of extras that are probably good for K12 teachers but I doubt I'll use any of them.
